description: This table tracks the history of changes to the Value Based Programs associated with pharmacy claims.

columns.name: CLAIM_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the claim info record

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: UPDATE_PROGRAM_ID
columns.description: The Value Based Program that was modified.

columns.name: UPDATE_PROGRAM_ID_RECORD_NAME
columns.description: The name of the program record.

columns.name: UPDATE_INSTANT_DTTM
columns.description: The local instant when the Value Based Program was modified.

columns.name: CLAIM_PROG_HX_ACTION_C_NAME
columns.description:
The action that modified the Value Based Program.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Added


Updated


Deactivated


Removed


Sent

columns.name: UPDATE_INSTANT_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The UTC instant when the Value Based Program was modified.

columns.name: VBP_HX_SENT_DXO_ID
columns.description: The DXO ID to which this claim was sent.

columns.name: VBP_HX_SENT_DXO_ID_EXTERNAL_NAME
columns.description: Organization's external name used as the display name on forms and user interfaces.
